attributes.additional_details:
Dear House of Commons,

Please improve our country!

Our good friend Julie is thinking of going back to France, she hasn't been feeling herself for some time now and we think it is because of the depressing state of the country. We have introduced her to English wine (which she was not aware of before) but I am not sure if it helped.

Please improve the country so that we do not lose one of the UK's most valuable assets!

Kind regards,

Everyone in London
